S04n470:1: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocata-duṣkaraṃ bhagavan paramaduṣkaramebhirbodhisattvairmahāsattvairutsoḍhaṃ bhagavato gauraveṇa |
S04n470:2: kathaṃ bhagavan ebhirbodhisattvairmahāsattvairayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ paścime kāle paścime samaye saṃprakāśayitavyaḥ?
S04n470:3: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat-caturṣu mañjuśrīrdharmeṣu pratiṣṭhitena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ paścime kāle paścime samaye saṃprakāśayitavyaḥ |
S04n470:5: iha mañjuśrīrbodhisattvena mahāsattvena ācāragocarapratiṣṭhitena ayaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ paścime kāle paścime samaye saṃprakāśayitavyaḥ |
S04n470:6: kathaṃ ca mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattva ācāragocarapratiṣṭhito bhavati?
S04n470:7: yadā ca mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣānto bhavati,
S04n470:9: yadā ca mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kasmiṃściddharme carati,
S04n470:14: yadā ca mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rājānaṃ saṃsevate,
S04n470:15: na rājaputrān na rājamahāmātrān na rājapuruṣān saṃsevate na bhajate na paryupāste nopasaṃkrāmati,
S04n470:18: na ca lokāyatamantradhārakān na lokāyatikān sevate na bhajate na paryupāste,
S04n470:19: na ca taiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃstavaṃ karoti |
S04n470:20: na cāṇḍalān na mauṣṭikān na saukarikān na kaukkuṭikān na mṛgalubdhakān na māṃsikān na naṭanṛttakān na jhallān na mallān |
S04n470:22: na ca taiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃstavaṃ karoti |
S04n470:25: śrāvakayānīyāṃśca bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā na sevate na bhajate na paryupāste,
S04n470:26: na ca taiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃstavaṃ karoti |
S04n470:27: na ca taiḥ saha samavadhānagocaro bhavati caṃkrame vā vihāre vā |
S04n470:28: anyatropasaṃkrāntānāṃ caiṣāṃ kālena kālaṃ dharmaṃ bhāṣate,
S04n470:31: punaraparaṃ mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvo na mātṛgrāmasya anyatarānyataramanunayanimittamudgṛhya abhīkṣṇaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
S04n470:32: na ca mātṛgrāmasya abhīkṣṇaṃ darśanakāmo bhavati |
S04n470:34: na ca dārikāṃ vā kanyāṃ vā vadhukāṃ vā abhīkṣṇamābhāṣitavyāṃ manyate,
S04n470:37: na ca tena sārdhaṃ saṃstavaṃ karoti,
S04n470:39: na caikākī bhikṣārthamantargṛhaṃ praviśati anyatra tathāgatānusmṛtiṃ bhāvayamānaḥ |
S04n470:45: na ca śrāmaṇeraṃ na ca śrāmaṇerīṃ na bhikṣuṃ na bhikṣuṇīṃ na kumārakaṃ na kumārikāṃ sātīyati,
S04n470:46: na ca taiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃstavaṃ karoti,
S04n470:51: punaraparaṃ mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmān śūnyān vyavalokayati,
S04n470:52: yathāvat pratiṣṭhitān dharmān aviparītasthāyino yathābhūtasthitānacalānakampyānavivartyānaparivartān sadā yathābhūtasthitānākāśasvabhāvānniruktivyavahāravivarjitānajātānabhutān anasaṃbhūtān asaṃskṛtān asaṃtānān asattābhilāpapravyāhṛtānasaṅgasthānasthitān saṃjñāviparyāsaprādurbhūtān |
S04n470:53: evaṃ hi mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvo'bhīkṣṇaṃ sarvadharmān vyavalokayan viharati anena vihāreṇa viharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gocare sthito bhavati |
S04n470:55: atha khalu bhagavānetamevārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśayamānastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata—
S04n470:60: ye cāpiṃ rājapuruṣāḥ kuryāttehi na saṃstavam |
S04n470:66: yā nirvṛtiṃ gaveṣanti dṛṣṭe dharme upāsikāḥ |
S04n470:69: tasya bhāṣet sadā dhīro anolīno aniśritaḥ ||7 ||
S04n470:72: na tā saṃmodayejjātu kauśalyaṃ hāsa pṛcchitum |
S04n470:78: vāramukhyā na seveta ye cānye bhogavṛttinaḥ |
S04n470:80: yadā ca dharmaṃ deśeyā mātṛgrāmasya paṇḍitaḥ |
S04n470:81: na caikaḥ praviśettatra nāpi hāsyasthito bhavet ||13 ||
S04n470:82: yadāpi praviśed grāmaṃ bhojanārthī punaḥ punaḥ |
S04n470:83: dvitīyaṃ bhikṣu mārgeta buddhaṃ vā samanusmaret ||14 ||
S04n470:88: strīti nācarate dhīro puruṣeti na kalpayet |
S04n470:90: ācāro hi ayaṃ ukto bodhisattvāna sarvaśaḥ |
S04n470:120: punaraparaṃ mañjuśrirbodhisattvo mahāsattvastathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya paścime kāle paścime samaye saddharmavipralope vartamāne imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayitukāmaḥ sukhasthito bhavati |
S04n470:121: sa sukhasthitaśca dharmaṃ bhāṣate kāyagataṃ vā pustakagataṃ vā |
S04n470:126: na cānyeṣāṃ śrāvakayānīyānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ nāma gṛhītvā avarṇa bhāṣate,
S04n470:131: sa āgatāgatānāṃ dhārmaśrāvaṇikānāmanuparigrāhikayā anabhyasūyayā dharmaṃ deśayati |
S04n470:132: avivadamāno na ca praśnaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ śrāvakayānena visarjayati |
S04n470:135: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata—
S04n470:178: na tasya duḥkhaṃ na ca antarāyo
S04n470:188: punaraparaṃ mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvastathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya saddharmakṣayāntakāle vartamāne idaṃ sūtraṃ dhārayamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'nīrṣuko bhavatyaśaṭho'māyāvī,
S04n470:191: na cānyeṣāṃ bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikānāṃ śrāvakayānīyānāṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānīyānāṃ vā bodhisattvayānīyānāṃ vā kaukṛtyamupasaṃharati-dūre yūyaṃ kulaputrā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ,
S04n470:201: ye ca daśasu dikṣu loke bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ,
S04n470:203: dharmaṃ ca deśayamāno'nūnamanadhikaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati samena dharmapremṇā,
S04n470:204: na ca kasyacidantaśo dharmapremṇāpyadhikataramanugrahaṃ karoti imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayamānaḥ ||
S04n470:205: anena mañjuśrīstṛtīyena dharmeṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya saddharmaparikṣayāntakāle vartamāne imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayamānaḥ sukhasparśaṃ viharati,
S04n470:211: pustakagataṃ ca kṛtvā satkariṣyanti gurukariṣyanti mānayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti ||
S04n470:214: śāṭhyaṃ ca mānaṃ tatha kūṭanāṃ ca
S04n470:238: punaraparaṃ mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvastathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya saddharmapratikṣayāntakāle vartamāne imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayitukāmastena bhikṣuṇā gṛhasthapravrajitānāmantikād dūreṇa dūraṃ vihartavyam,
S04n470:240: ye ca sattvā bodhāya saṃprasthitā bhavanti,
S04n470:244: ye tathāgatasyopāyakauśalyaṃ saṃdhābhāṣitaṃ na śṛṇvanti na jānanti na budhyante na pṛcchanti na śraddadhanti nādhimucyante |
S04n470:247: api tu khalu punarahametāmanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya yo yasmin sthito bhaviṣyati,
S04n470:248: taṃ tasminneva ṛddhibalenāvarjayiṣyāmi pattīyāpayiṣyāmi avatārayiṣyāmi paripācayiṣyāmi ||
S04n470:249: anenāpi mañjuśrīścaturthena dharmeṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayamāno'vyābādho bhavati,
S04n470:250: satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikānāṃ rājñā rajaputrāṇāṃ rājāmātyānāṃ rājamahāmātrāṇāṃ naigamajānapadānāṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnām |
S04n470:251: antarīkṣāvacarāścāsya devatāḥ śrāddhāḥ pṛṣṭhato'nubaddhā bhaviṣyanti dharmaśravaṇāya |
S04n470:252: devaputrāścāsya sadānubaddhā bhaviṣyantyārakṣāyai grāmagatasya vā vihāragatasya vā |
S04n470:254: tasya ca vyākaraṇenaṃ tuṣṭā udagrā āttamanaskā bhaviṣyanti |
S04n470:258: durlabho'sya mañjuśrīrdharmaparyāyasya bahuṣu lokadhātuṣu śabdo vā ghoṣo vā nāmaśravo vā ||
S04n470:259: tadyathāpi nāma mañjuśrī rājā bhavati balacakravartī,
S04n470:261: tato'sya pratyarthikāḥ pratyamitrāḥ pratirājānastena sārdhaṃ vigrahamāpannā bhavanti |
S04n470:262: atha tasya rājño balacakravartino vividhā yodhā bhavanti |
S04n470:264: atha sa rājā tān yodhān yudhyamānān dṛṣṭvā teṣāṃ yodhānāṃ prīto bhavatyāttamanaskaḥ |
S04n470:265: sa prīta āttamanāḥ samānasteṣāṃ yodhānāṃ vividhāni dānāni dadāti |
S04n470:266: tadyathā grāmaṃ vā grāmakṣetrāṇi vā dadāti,
S04n470:269: veṣṭanāni hastābharaṇāni pādābharaṇāni kaṇṭhābharaṇāni karṇābharaṇāni sauvarṇasūtrāṇi hārārdhahārāṇi hiraṇyasuvarṇamaṇimuktāvaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālānyapi dadāti,
S04n470:274: eka eva hi sa cūḍāmaṇī rājño mūrdhasthāyī |
S04n470:275: yadā punarmañjuśrī rājā tamapi cūḍāmaṇiṃ dadāti,
S04n470:276: tadā sa sarvo rājñaścaturaṅgabalakāya āścaryaprāpto bhavatyadbhutaprāptaḥ |
S04n470:277: evameva mañjuśrīstathāgato'pyarhan samyaksaṃbuddho dharmasvāmī dharmarājā svena bāhubalanirjitena puṇyabalanirjitena traidhātuke dharmeṇa dharmarājyaṃ kārayati |
S04n470:279: atha khalu tathāgatasyāpi āryā yodhā māreṇa sārdhaṃ yudhyante |
S04n470:280: atha khalu mañjuśrīstathāgato'pyarhan samyaksaṃbuddho dharmasvāmī dharmarājā teṣāmāryāṇāṃ yodhānāṃ yudhyatāṃ dṛṣṭvā vividhāni sūtraśatasahasrāṇi bhāṣate sma catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ saṃharṣaṇārtham |
S04n470:284: tatra mañjuśrīryathā sa rājā balacakravartī teṣāṃ yodhānāṃ yudhyatāṃ mahatā puruṣakāreṇa vismāpitaḥ samānaḥ paścāttaṃ sarvasvabhūtaṃ paścimaṃ cūḍāmaṇiṃ dadāti sarvalokāśraddheyaṃ vismayabhūtam |
S04n470:285: yathā mañjuśrīstasya rājñaḥ sa cūḍāmaṇiścirarakṣito mūrdhasthāyī,
S04n470:286: evameva mañjuśrīstathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastraidhātuke dharmarājo dharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayamāṇo yasmin samaye paśyati śrāvakāṃśca bodhisattvāṃśca skandhamāreṇa vā kleśamāreṇa vā sārdhaṃ yudhyamānān,
S04n470:287: taiśca sārdhaṃ yudhyamānairyadā rāgadveṣamohakṣayaḥ sarvatraidhātukānniḥsaraṇaṃ sarvamāranirghātanaṃ mahāpuruṣakāraḥ kṛto bhavati,
S04n470:288: tadā tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho'pyārāgitaḥ samānasteṣāmāryāṇāṃ yodhānāmimamevaṃrūpaṃ sarvalokavipratyanīkaṃ sarvalokāśraddheyamabhāṣitapūrvamanirdiṣṭapūrvaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhāṣate sma |
S04n470:289: sarveṣāṃ sarvajñatāhārakaṃ mahācūḍāmaṇiprakhyaṃ tathāgataḥ śrāvakebhyo'nuprayacchati sma |
S04n470:293: yo'yaṃ mañjuśrīstathāgatena adya tenaiva rājñā balacakravartinā ciraparirakṣitaścūḍāmaṇiravamucya yodhebhyo dattaḥ |
S04n470:294: evameva mañjuśrīstathāgato'pīmaṃ dharmaguhyaṃ cirānurakṣitaṃ sarvadharmaparyāyāṇāṃ mūrdhasthāyi tathāgatavijñeyam |
S04n470:296: atha khalu bhagavānetamevārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśayamānastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata—
S04n470:335: saṃrakṣitaṃ me na ca jātu proktaṃ
S04n470:341: na tasya śoko na pi cāntarāyo
S04n470:343: na ca cchavī kṛṣṇika tasya bhoti
S04n470:349: na tasya śastraṃ na viṣaṃ kadācit
S04n470:388: samādhi so labdhu jinaṃ ca paśyati ||67 ||
